Description: Handmade cup with rounded base. Homogenous black fabric heavy in organic temper. Rough burnishing on exterior surface, decorated with a band of incised cross-hatching 3mm below the rim, and two stippled crosses made of four triangular patterns on opposite sides. Interior ashy. Rim damaged. Adams type H11 (Adams 1986, 419-420).
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Faras (Nubia), Meroitic Cemetery Tomb-Group 1/654 R
